text: so, that sounds more like something you'd say if you didn't want a relationship with someone. this isn't working out, but i'll always have feelings for you. i'm sorry i slept with your best friend, but i'll always have feelings for you. here's the thing, lisa, i'm into dudes now, but i'll always have feelings for you.
